SEARCH
Package gw.api.database

Interface IQuery<T extends Bean>

All Known Subinterfaces:
ISelectQueryBuilder<T>, Restriction<T>, Table<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
GroupingQuery, Query
public interface IQuery<T extends Bean>
Used to create a new query to the database. The provided bean type is used as the result type.
Author:
dbrewster

  • Method Details

    • select

      IQueryBeanResult<T> select()
      Returns:
      a new result set of beans for the query. The query is not executed until the first result is read.

    • select

      IQueryResult<T,QueryRow> select(IQuerySelectColumn... columns)
      Returns:
      a new result set of query row for the query. The query is not executed until the first result is read.

    • toString

      String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the query that will be executed against the database.

    • isLogSQL

      boolean isLogSQL()
      Returns:
      true if the sql for this query will be logged, false if not. The query is logged to the PLLoggerCategory.SERVER_DATABASE log category at the info level

    • withLogSQL

      IQuery<T> withLogSQL(boolean logSQL)
      Turns on or off SQL logging. The query is logged to the PLLoggerCategory.SERVER_DATABASE log category at the info level
      Parameters:
      logSQL - true to log SQL, false to not
      Returns:
      the this ptr

    • getRawQuery

      @Deprecated com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.QueryImpl getRawQuery()
      Deprecated.
      Do not use. The underlying query implementation object has methods that will not work when used in conjunction with this interface. This is only provided for backward-compatibility with older APIs that require instances of Query.
      Gets the underlying query implementation object.

    • setRootName_Beware

      @Deprecated void setRootName_Beware(String rootName)
      Deprecated.
      !!Beware!! Use sparingly. Sets the name of the root table alias.

    • hasRestrictions

      boolean hasRestrictions()
      Returns:
      true if the query has restrictions

    • intersect

      @Deprecated GroupingQuery<T> intersect(IQuery<T> intersectQuery)
      Deprecated.
      Do not use. Using this method could cause a performance problem. A more efficient query version should be considered. For example, if both sides of INTERSECT are querying the same table, use a single query and have the restriction be the ANDing of the restrictions from both sides of the INTERSECT.
      Intersects this query with the query passed in. The return type of the two queries must be equal.
      Parameters:
      intersectQuery - the query to union with

    • union

      GroupingQuery<T> union(IQuery<T> unionQuery)
      Unions this query with the query passed in. The return type of the two queries must be equal. The result query will not contain duplicate queries from the two sets. Union can only be done once on a query. Basically this method builds a binary tree and the result of this method is the union of this query and unionQuery.
      Parameters:
      unionQuery - the query to union with
      Returns:
      the result query that is the union of this and the query passed in.

    • getEntityType

      IEntityType getEntityType()
      Returns:
      the entity type this table is querying on
